Record Group 1. Governance, administration, and 3-School affairs (1888-2016; 64.42 linear feet)
Series IV. Office of the 3-School Director
Subseries IV.D Office of the Director - Wagner through Tofel

Ethics material (7 folders), Faculty recruitment, Fisk & Southern Colleges, [Fieldston] Arts Center, Fieldston School Day Camp. Ethics includes committee work, reports, ethics textbook and correspondence with the Brooklyn Society for Ethical Culture. Bulk of materials created during the 1960s.
